channel.title: Blue screen and white menu
channel.description: Hi. I've just recently installed black mesa and a huge fan of the original HL. When i start the game the menu is white, also when i get shot and in the chapter blast pit (One of my fav original chapters) when i fall into the radiation pit the screen goes blue. PLZZZZ help.

item.title: Blue screen and white menu
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
PLZZZZ follow the bug reporting guidelines and make a habbit of performing a forum search before starting up a new thread. As you hadn’t posted your hardware specs I can’t tell for sure but chances are 90% that you’re on outdated hardware or use Intel GPU to play the game. Read sticky FAQ thread to get info on how to switch the game into dxlevel 90/95/98 mode and try using one of workarounds for legacy/old hardware I propose here (reported to help people having exactly the same problem as yours): https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=502093#post502093

Read full topic
